lines.text: Isn't he sweet! Do you hate dogs, Honey because I can lock him up!
Do you want to step onto the terrace, Charles?
That's not a terrace, Christy. That's a ledge!
Would you like some new shoes?
New shoes?
Yes, those look pretty old.
Thanks a bunch Charles! These happen to be an original 30's design. From the 30's!
I know, wouldn't you like some new ones?
Would you like to sit down?
What do you have in mind Charles? A kerb?
Good morning, Christy.
Good morning, Judas!
I really like you Christy.
Yeah, I know. Why don't we keep it that way, huh?
You think?
Yeah, I guess so. Why don't you kiss me anyway, it's such a nice afternoon.
That boy is very attractive but I don't think he understands the language.

You're a shit! I for one am sick and tired, honey. Sick and tired. I'm not going to be one of your passive ladies trembling at the thought of you or to put up with any kind of maltreatment just for the glorious opportunity of spending a glorious night with you. Not once a week not once in a while not once in a blue moon, not by a long-shot honey, uh uh, no way. Unfortunately, honey you're some kisser... and you're very mean to me.
Are you coming tonight Johnny?
I'll try kid.
I know what that means.
You're Christy Miller, the country singer? No shit!
Well' there's some dispute about that, honey, but thanks.
Lousy detectives. Couldn't follow an elephant up 5th. Girls slip through their fingers like sand.
Watch out for him, Angela. He's as slippery as the dickens.
It's been a rough morning. My toilet exploded. Yes, I flushed it quite innocently, you would have thought a bomb went off. Just lucky I wasn't sitting on it!
Something's fishy!
Well, Charles forgive me if I laugh. Ha Ha!
The dog is injured!
Well, Charles you are looking sexy today.
Really? Well I guess I'm running late.
Do you always look sexy when you're running late? I guess I'll have to keep you tardy.
Why don't you come up to my place Charles? I can't cook a thing but I know where everything is.
He's furious! He's foaming at the mouth!
What do you think of these Charles?
Christy, where did you get those? Those are very unattractive shoes.
Well I hate them, Honey. I thought you liked them.
No, I was referring to these boots. Here try those on.
Anything you say Charles. I've got to get out of this dress. It does absolutely nothing for me.
